name: cpu::local::static_cpu_local::StaticStorage::<T>::as_ptr

cpu::local::static_cpu_local::StaticStor.doc: Gets the offset of the CPU-local object in the CPU-local area.

arch::cpu::local::get_base.doc: Gets the base address for the CPU local storage by reading the GS base model-specific register.

core::mem::align_of.doc:
Returns the [ABI]-required minimum alignment of a type in bytes.

 Every reference to a value of the type `T` must be a multiple of this number.

 This is the alignment used for struct fields. It may be smaller than the preferred alignment.

 [ABI]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Application_binary_interface

 # Examples

 ```
 assert_eq!(4, align_of::<i32>());
 ```

doc:
Gets access to the underlying value through a raw pointer.

 This method is safe, but using the returned pointer will be unsafe.
